reference_article: Elon Musk announces that Tesla will start accepting Dogecoin for select merchandise, reigniting DOGE's price surge.

articles_list.content: Elon Musk tweets a meme about Dogecoin, causing a 10% price spike within hours.
A bipartisan group of U.S. lawmakers introduces a new crypto taxation bill targeting high-net-worth individuals.
Russia explores launching its own digital ruble as sanctions tighten amid global tensions.
A prominent Hollywood actor launches an NFT collection, selling out within minutes and generating $5 million.
The Pentagon investigates the security implications of blockchain use in defense logistics.
Trump's campaign accepts Bitcoin donations, marking the first major political campaign to do so in 2025.
Vitalik Buterin warns about rising Ethereum gas fees, suggesting potential protocol adjustments.
Mark Cuban invests in a new DeFi project focusing on yield farming and liquidity pools.
A cyberattack on a major crypto exchange leads to a temporary halt in withdrawals worldwide.
The IMF publishes a critical report on El Salvador's Bitcoin adoption, raising economic stability concerns.
